name: INCO2k25 Dev Container
postCreateCommand: python3 -m venv backend/.venv && source backend/.venv/bin/activate && python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip && python3 -m pip install -r backend/requirements.txt && python3 -m pip install 'uvicorn[standard]'
postStartCommand: source backend/.venv/bin/activate && python3 backend/main.py & cd frontend && python3 -m http.server 8080 & cd ..
